txt.en: 'Are you ready to get caught up with the story? I can complete the first four chapters of the Black Book of Mordor for you! I'll also make sure to complete Epic Volume IV Book 9 concerning the destruction of the Ring and the collapse of the Black Gate!\n\n'Speak to me when you're ready, and I'll put pen to paper and write this all down!'
Completion of this quest will flag your character as having completed Epic Volume IV, Book 9 and the first four chapters of the Black Book of Mordor.
Talk to MadeOfLions to complete Volume IV, Book 9 and the first four chapters of the Black Book of Mordor!
'Ready to complete Volume IV Book 9 and the first four chapters of the Black Book of Mordor? Here we go!'
